comp303.fivehundred.ai
Interface IBiddingStrategy

All Known Subinterfaces:
IRobotPlayer
All Known Implementing Classes:
RandomBiddingStrategy, RandomRobot
public interface IBiddingStrategy

Specifies the bid selection behavior. All parameters passed to methods of this class should be cloned or immutable because this functionality can be obtained from various sources.

Method Summary
 Bid selectBid(Bid[] pPreviousBids, Hand pHand)
          Produces a valid bid, i.e., a between 6 and 10 for any suit or no trump, that is higher that the last bid.
 

Method Detail

selectBid

Bid selectBid(Bid[] pPreviousBids,
              Hand pHand)
Produces a valid bid, i.e., a between 6 and 10 for any suit or no trump, that is higher that the last bid.

Parameters:
pPreviousBids - All the previous bids for this hand, in order. The size of the array is the number of bids already entered (between 0 and 3).
pHand - The cards in the hand of the player entering the bid.
Returns:
A valid bid (higher than the last bid, or pass).
Precondition:
pPreviousBids.length <= 3, pHand.size() == 10
